name: Hazy
author: Zucram
notes: Okey, I have casually been playing this game for a year. My first thought of this game on release day was; It is going to be a thing for a month and then go away. I started seeing people stream and on YouTube, and I was EH! First time KoG. The deck I used was a Aroma strategy Hazy and Legend to KoG 3SD Hazy.
